mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNFILE (ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, USE_AT) VALUES ( #{atchFileId}, NOW(), 'Y')

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM LETTNFILE a, LETTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

ORDER BY a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_SN LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

AND b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
